channel.title: Bookstack
channel.description:
EDIT: No longer used in preference for Discourse.
EDIT: I've taken down the site for now out of concerns about the approach. See conversation below! I uploaded the "Clay Bodies" section of the Clayart archives into an open-source project called Bookstack (https://www.bookstackapp.com/). Bookstack is a VERY simple Wiki/Book/Documentation app. It allows for Facebook/Google login and uses WYSIWYG text editing. The test website doesn't require login, just click "Edit" to edit a page. http://test.denormalized.net/…/clay-bodies/page/southern-ice http://test.denormalized.net/books (The email archives are organized by threads visible in the "Page Navigation", unfortunately the subjects of threads are often changed, and therefore it's messy.)
